channel.title: Ip banning. HELP
channel.description: Ok i wanted to no if there was a way i could ban someone so that they can no longer make anougther acount without ip banning. When i ip ban someone they simply change there ip using a website, please can some tell me the command so i can add it. Bascailly i want a command or some sort of way of banning someone from making anougther acc or coming on again with ip banning. A way of doing the same thing an ip ban would do if the persond dint change the ip adress. :D Thanks guys.

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“sebastianm10, post:10, topic:166085”]To be honest with you…

There will never be a ban that can make a person not use Proxy to go back in your Server… It will never work. Proxy will always win. And you will need to live with that… you will IP Ban him, but he will be back… Because Proxy will once again, ALWAYS WIN…[/quote]

Lies no one actully uses a proxy they just mass login and your shitty servers cant keep up with the packets and let one by the ip ban and let him/her connect to your server, if you think its a proxy your wrong its their hostname instead of ip

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Ive also found that you go into data and click on banned ips turn off your server for 10 seconds, put their name in there, and close, accept and it says “username here” has failed to log on because their ip is banned “username here” has disconnected

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @sebastianm10 sebastianm10
item.description:
@sebastianm10 wrote:

To be honest with you…

There will never be a ban that can make a person not use Proxy to go back in your Server… It will never work. Proxy will always win. And you will need to live with that… you will IP Ban him, but he will be back… Because Proxy will once again, ALWAYS WIN…

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

You need the appendToBannedIP method…

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

I now get this error :S:(

client.java:10574: cannot find symbol symbol : method appendToBannedIP(java.lang.String) location: class client appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add a } under if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lol"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); }

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

[quote=“Amerks5, post:4, topic:166085”]Search for “ban” in client.java and add this:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lol"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); }
hope it helped@[/quote]

I get this error any help?

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount client.java:12500: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning. HELP
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Search for “ban” in client.java and add this:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lol"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); }
hope it helped@

Read full topic

No, could you please give me it, thank you.
